verses.verse: My heart<WH3820> is gushing<WH7370> a good<WH2896> matter<WH1697>: I speak<WH559> of the things which I have made<WH4639> touching the king<WH4428>: my tongue<WH3956> is the pen<WH5842> of a ready<WH4106> writer<WH5608>.
You are fairer<WH3302> than the sons<WH1121> of men<WH120>: grace<WH2580> is poured<WH3332> into your lips<WH8193>: therefore God<WH430> has blessed<WH1288> you for ever<WH5769>.
Clothe<WH2296> your sword<WH2719> upon your thigh<WH3409>, O most mighty<WH1368>, with your glory<WH1935> and your majesty<WH1926>.

And in your majesty<WH1926> ride<WH7392> prosperously<WH6743> because<WH1697> of truth<WH571> and meekness<WH6037> and righteousness<WH6664>; and your right hand<WH3225> shall teach<WH3384> you terrible things<WH3372>.
Your arrows<WH2671> are sharp<WH8150> in the heart<WH3820> of the king<WH4428>'s enemies<WH341>; by which the people<WH5971> fall under you<WH5307>.
Your throne<WH3678>, O God<WH430>, is for ever<WH5769> and ever<WH5703>: the scepter<WH7626> of your kingdom<WH4438> is a right<WH4334> scepter<WH7626>.

You love<WH157> righteousness<WH6664>, and hate<WH8130> wickedness<WH7562>: therefore God<WH430>, your God<WH430>, has anointed<WH4886> you with the oil<WH8081> of gladness<WH8342> above your fellows<WH2270>.
All your garments<WH899> smell of myrrh<WH4753>, and aloes<WH174>, and cassia<WH7102>, out of the ivory<WH8127> palaces<WH1964>, by which<WH4482> they have made you glad<WH8055>.
Kings<WH4428>' daughters<WH1323> were among your honorable women<WH3368>: upon your right hand<WH3225> did stand<WH5324> the queen<WH7694> in gold<WH3800> of Ophir<WH211>.
Listen<WH8085>, O daughter<WH1323>, and consider<WH7200>, and incline<WH5186> your ear<WH241>; forget<WH7911> also your own people<WH5971>, and your father<WH1>'s house<WH1004>;
So shall the king<WH4428> greatly desire<WH183> your beauty<WH3308>: for he is your Lord<WH113>; and worship you him<WH7812>.
And the daughter<WH1323> of Tyre<WH6865> shall be there with a gift<WH4503>; even the rich<WH6223> among the people<WH5971> shall entreat<WH2470> your favor<WH6440>.
The king<WH4428>'s daughter<WH1323> is all glorious<WH3520> inside<WH6441>: her clothing<WH3830> is of worked<WH4865> gold<WH2091>.
She shall be brought<WH2986> unto the king<WH4428> in clothes of needlework<WH7553>: the virgins<WH1330> her companions<WH7464> that follow<WH310> her shall be brought unto you<WH935>.
With gladness<WH8057> and rejoicing<WH1524> shall they be brought<WH2986>: they shall enter<WH935> into the king<WH4428>'s palace<WH1964>.
Instead of your fathers<WH1> shall be your sons<WH1121>, whom you may make<WH7896> princes<WH8269> in all the earth<WH776>.
I will make your name<WH8034> to be remembered<WH2142> in all<WH1755> generations<WH1755>: therefore shall the people<WH5971> praise<WH3034> you for ever<WH5769> and ever<WH5703>.
